column3: රාජකාරි භාර නිළධ්‍ාරි / flik mjpfhhp / Duty Officer : 011 2670002
මාධය ප්‍රකාශක / nra;jp njhlHghsHfs; / Media Spokesmen :

column1: 06 persons were trapped in kumalanai GN Division in Mullthive district on 08th
November 2018 due to bunt breach of Niththaha Tank.
Emergency Operation center of the Disaster Management Centre coordinated Army,
Navy, Air force and Police to rescue trapped persons immediately by 8pm. Army and
Police teams were immidiatly deployed in to the affected area and they were
continuously supported to rescue the people and Air force provided the air support
to rescue 6 persons by 7am on 9th November 2018.
